channel.title: Player list code?
channel.description: i have a server. i need a code to add to my server. a player list like allstar,figment. im ussing ddsspeced i had it before but deleted on accdent does anyone know the player list code? if you do thank you.

item.title: Player list code?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

// You can declare and use this method optionally to make the list spiffier, but that's your choice.
private String getColorForRank()
{
    switch(playerRights)
    {
        case 1:
            return "@blu@"; // If the player is a moderator, their name will be written in blue.
        break;

        case 2:
            return "@yel@"; // If the player is an administrator, their name will be written in yellow.
        break;

        default:
            return "@red@"; // Otherwise, their name will be written in red.
        break;
    }
}
...
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("players"))
{
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dre@Players", 8144);
    sendQuest("@blu@Players Online: " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8145);
    for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++)
    {
        client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
        if(c != null)
        {
            sendQuest(c.getColorForRank() + c.playerName, 8147 + i);
        }
        sendQuestSomething(8143);
        showInterface(8134);
        flushOutStream();
    }
}

Read full topic
